body:
As the topic on the top says, this is AMA.
This is my first AMA, and it is also going to be the last.
I have been around avicus for 2 years now, and
I have been here when Avicus was Mczone.
I am 14 years old now, and I live in seoul,
South korea. My favorite food is Chazti, a Japanese
food.(Idk whether I pronouced it correctly.)
So there was some introduction of myself.
So it is free to ask question to me, and any
questions would be appreciated,
Thanks
